Landing.title: PUZZL THINK
Landing.subtitle: Free Sudoku for Everyone
Landing.description: Compete in Sudoku with players from all over the world!

Sudoku.tip1Desc: Scan rows and columns to eliminate possibilities in a 3x3 box.
Sudoku.tip2Desc: If a row, col, or box has only 1 or 2 empty cells, fill those in first.
Sudoku.tip3Desc: Press the Spacebar to note candidates. Patterns will reveal themselves.
Sudoku.tip4Desc: Sudoku can always be solved with strict logic. Don't guess!

Tutorial.step0Desc: Let's quickly go over the sleek controls designed to keep you in the zone.
Tutorial.step1Desc: Tap cells or use the Arrow keys on your keyboard to zip around the board seamlessly.
Tutorial.step2Desc: Click the number pad below or use your keyboard's number keys to fill in answers instantly.
Tutorial.step3Desc: Press the Spacebar to instantly toggle Notes mode, perfect for marking down possibilities.
Tutorial.step4Desc: Stay focused, minimize mistakes, and challenge your personal best. Good luck!

Escape.title: Web Crime Scene
Escape.firstStoryDesc: A murder on a stormy night. Gather clues and find the culprit.
Escape.landingDescription: Explore rooms, collect clues, and uncover the culprit in this interactive story.
Escape.detectiveMessage1: First, let's hear everyone's alibis since you were all in the living room...
Escape.detectiveMessageLiving: Time of death is 0:05 on Feb 22. Please tell me your alibis from 11 PM to 1 AM.
Escape.detectiveMessageAfterLiving: Let's check the crime scene first. I heard the cause of death was stabbing in the bathroom...
Escape.detectiveMessageBath: Stabbed to death... Let's look for anything that could be a clue.
Escape.detectiveMessageAfterBath: Now let's search the rooms for clues.
Escape.detectiveMessageSon: Alcohol, gambling, loan documents... A son with many problems.
Escape.startDisclaimer: Progress is saved on this device.
Escape.chapter0Subtitle: CHAPTER 0: Invitation to a Manor in the Storm
Escape.chapter0Overview: February 22, 2026. On a night of pitch-black darkness and howling storms, a scream echoed through 'Blue Moon Manor,' perched on a quiet ridge on the outskirts of the city.
Escape.chapter0Victim: Chairman Choi Byung-chulâ€”founder and absolute ruler of 'Blue Moon,' Korea's largest financial empire. Tonight he was found a cold corpse in the manor's ornate bathtub, a knife buried in his chest.
Escape.chapter0Victim2: The luxury watch on his wrist had stopped at 12:05, silently testifying to the truth of that night.
Escape.chapter0SuspectsIntro: The manor was completely isolated by the storm. There was no sign of outside intrusion. The culprit is one of the five people inside.
Escape.chapter0Suspect1: Attorney Kim (Right Hand): An ambitious figure who handled all of the chairman's legal issues and irregularities. Rumors say his relationship of trust with the chairman had recently cracked.
Escape.chapter0Suspect2: Secretary Kim (Shadow): The one who managed slush funds at the chairman's side. He may have been plotting something far greater...
Escape.chapter0Suspect3: Reporter Lee (Infiltrator): He entered the manor under the guise of writing a memoir. But there is more than one thing suspicious about him.
Escape.chapter0Suspect4: Housekeeper Ahn (Witness): She has watched over the back of the manor for decades. She knows its secrets better than anyone and had recently come to hold a deep grudge against the chairman.
Escape.chapter0Suspect5: Choi Jun-ho (Son): The only son, on the brink of losing his inheritance due to gambling and debauchery. He had a desperate reason only his father's death could satisfy.
Escape.chapter0MissionQuote: All truth lies asleep within the clues.
Escape.chapter0MissionIntro: Only one hour remains until the storm subsides and the suspects leave. You have now been granted full authority over the case and must open the doors of this manor as the detective.
Escape.chapter0Mission1: Gather the crucial clues hidden in each room.
Escape.chapter0Mission2: Expose the contradictions in the suspects' false testimony.
Escape.chapter0Mission3: Piece together the stopped clock and scattered clues to name the true murderer.
Escape.chapter0Closing: Are you ready to find the truth in this darkness?
Escape.chapter0SystemMessage: The detective's investigation begins now. Which room will you investigate first?
Escape.selectCluePrompt: Select a clue to answer the question.
